title: Independence Day Rough Cuts
description:
Summary:
In this episode I discuss some of the tips I learned in the Secret Service for preparedness, along with some fitness tips.
 
News Picks:
This is the best workout I’ve ever tried.
 
Are Democrats pushing for a shotgun ban now?
 
Post-apocalyptic movies are all the rage.
 
This pro-life film is under attack.
